ygData.subject: RE: Research Spells
ygData.messageBody:
http://eq.castersrealm.com

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jim Broek [SMTP:provid@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 2:19 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Research Spells
>
> From: Jim Broek <provid@...>
>
>
> Greetings,
>
> Let me first say that I've been lurking on this list for quite
> awhile and am amazed at the helpfulness and expertise of many
> of the contributors. Many times after reading the EQEnchanter
> list, I've gotten an 'I never knew that!' piece of information.
> Which is refreshing after reading through the mess of sites like
> Everlore packed with mis-information, boasting, and useless blather.
>
> So...a big thank-you to all of you who contribute. I think I
> speak for many who appreciate the sharing of your knowledge.
>
> Now my question, I've just entered lvl 16, and am confused
> by how the Research spells work. Can anyone point me to
> a URL that has some detailed information?
>
> Thanks
>
> Ramxes
> 16 Enchanter
> Quellious
>
>
